items.title: Notre Dame Fighting Irish Football: Texas A&M Aggies Q&A with Good Bull Hunting
items.summary: Well friends, after an annoyingly long break between Game #1 and Game #2 for our Notre Dame Fighting Irish football team, Marcus Freeman and co. are back at it again this weekend, facing another top-20 opponent as they try to bounce back from the disappointing performance in their 27-24 loss at Miami on Sunday of […]

items.title: Throwback Thursday: Notre Dame Fighting Irish Football VS Texas A&M, 1994
items.summary: New Year’s Day in Dallas has a way of compressing an entire season into a handful of decisive snaps. In 1994, it squeezed out two truths at once: Notre Dame could slug with anybody, and the national crown had slipped away six weeks earlier. Lou Holtz’s Irish arrived at the Cotton Bowl carrying the sting […]

items.title: NBC Sports will start its 35th season of Notre Dame Football broadcasts
items.summary: It’s been 35 years… From the NBC Sports press release: “HERE COME THE IRISH!” – NBC SPORTS KICKS OFF 35TH SEASON OF NOTRE DAME FOOTBALL AS NO. 8 FIGHTING IRISH HOST NO. 16 TEXAS A&M THIS SATURDAY AT 7:30 P.M. ET ON NBC AND PEACOCK NBC Sports Has Presented Every Notre Dame Football Regular-Season Home Game […]

items.title: Notre Dame Football night game records since 2017
items.summary: Notre Dame football and night games go hand in hand. While Ohio State is currently battling FOX over too many noon games — perhaps the Irish play too many night games each season, but they generally play pretty well at night (especially at home). The Irish welcome the Texas A&M Aggies to Notre Dame Stadium […]

items.title: When, where, and how to watch Notre Dame VS Texas A&M
items.summary: Are you looking for a college football season restart? In a lot of ways, this game between Notre Dame and Texas A&M is very much like resetting the game console. There’s no way to erase the loss to Miami, but many of the questions that arose from it could be vanquished with a better performance […]
